title: leading space in $tag

labels.name: üå± good first issue
labels.description: Good first issue to get your feet wet.

body:
#### Current Behavior
There is a leading space in `$tag` in `git_commit` module and can't be removed.

#### Expected Behavior
removing this leading space and move it into `tag_symbol`

#### Additional context/Screenshots

https://github.com/starship/starship/blob/6817e7f6981d4cdd16367eec725e75bd6089d3a0/src/modules/git_commit.rs#L82-L85

#### Possible Solution
<!--- Only if you have suggestions on a fix for the bug -->

#### Environment
- Starship version: 0.53.0
- bash version: GNU bash, version 4.4.23(1)-release (x86_64-pc-msys)
Copyright (C) 2016 Free Software Foundation, Inc.
License GPLv3+: GNU GPL version 3 or later <http://gnu.org/licenses/gpl.html>

This is free software; you are free to change and redistribute it.
There is NO WARRANTY, to the extent permitted by law.
- Operating system: Windows 10.0.19042
- Terminal emulator: mintty 3.4.7
- Git Commit Hash: 7459571a
- Branch/Tag: v0.53.0
- Rust Version: rustc 1.51.0 (2fd73fabe 2021-03-23)
- Rust channel: stable-x86_64-pc-windows-msvc (default) release
- Build Time: 2021-05-01 18:09:23
#### Relevant Shell Configuration

```bash
# eval "$(direnv hook bash)"
_direnv_hook() {
  local previous_exit_status=$?;
  eval "$("C:/Users/Trim21/scoop/apps/direnv/current/direnv.exe" export bash)";
  return $previous_exit_status;
};

if ! [[ "${PROMPT_COMMAND:-}" =~ _direnv_hook ]]; then
  PROMPT_COMMAND="_direnv_hook${PROMPT_COMMAND:+;$PROMPT_COMMAND}"
fi
eval "$(gh completion -s bash)"

chcp.com 65001

export STARSHIP_CONFIG=~/.config/starship.toml
eval "$(starship init bash)"
```

#### Starship Configuration

```toml
add_newline = false
# Which is equivalent to
format = """
$directory([$git_branch$git_commit$git_state$git_status](red))\
$python\
$status $character"""

[character] # The name of the module we are configuring is "character"
success_symbol = "#" # The "success_symbol" segment is being set to "‚ûú" with the color "bold green"
error_symbol = "[#](bold red)"

[directory]
truncation_length = 8
truncate_to_repo = false

[git_branch]
symbol = ""
# truncation_length = 4
truncation_symbol = ""
format = '\($branch'
only_attached = true

[git_commit]
format = '\($hash$tag'
tag_disabled = false
# tag_symbol = ""
tag_symbol = ""

[git_state]
rebase = 'REBASE'
merge = 'MERGE'
revert = "REVERT"
cherry_pick = "CHERRY-PICK"
bisect = 'BISECT'

[git_status]
format = '([$all_status$ahead_behind](#FFFFFF)\) )'
##
ahead = "‚Üë${count}"
behind = "‚Üì${count}"
diverged = "X‚Üì${ahead_count}‚Üë${behind_count}"
##
conflicted = "X"
untracked = "?"
stashed = ""
modified = "+"
staged = '[+$count](green)'
renamed = ">"
deleted = "-"

# style = ''
[python]

style = '#c5dbed'
version_format = 'v${raw}'
format = '[${symbol}${version}(\($virtualenv\))]($style)'
```
